text:
[Verse]
Raindrops fallin' down
On this busy town
Feet can't stay on ground
Spin me all around

[Verse 2]
Umbrellas in the air
Love is everywhere
City lights so bright
Dancin' through the night

[Chorus]
Oh oh
Dancin' in the rain
Feelin' no more pain
Oh oh
Dancin' in the rain
Let the music play

[Verse 3]
Splashes in the street
Groovin' to the beat
Feel the rhythm heat
Movin' our tired feet

[Bridge]
Clouds are open wide
Joy we cannot hide
Dancing side by side
Life is such a ride

[Verse 4]
Rainfalls clear the way
For a brighter day
In this wet ballet
We can't drift away
title: Dancing in the Rain
